message.body: Describe my personality.
Awkward
Lmao
Ok that seems appropriate
Ahaha... sooo I named my cat Abu
Hahahah! Thats cute, from aladdin?
Yea.. Steph thought of it because she said he has a monkey face
I was thinking between Abu or Brutus. Brutus because it big, tough and mean yet he is a sweet calm kitten. Like an oxymoron.
I like both, but abu is more fitting for a cat
Yea I think it fits his personality lol... if he was a girl then it was going to be Cinnamon
Does shadow like abu?
They haven't met yet... for now Abu is in the back bedroom until he is use to the house and us. Plus that room is empty right now, its the one im painting.
But I don't want Abu near shadow until he gets his shots. He has a vet appt on Wednesday
Oh ok. He does have a monkey face. Im allergic to cats.
Lol he does.. and you are? That s####. So does that mean you can't be near him?
Like what happens if you're near him? Steph is allergic as well, but only a lil bit not severely
No i can be, i just gets bumps on my neck and it itches bad. Only some cats though. Depends how much dander is on them i guess.
Oh ok.. what time you start school on wed?
8 everay day
That ##### too.. his appt is at 9, was going to see it you wanted to go with me but never mind
Yeah im in school then.
That's alright you'll meet him eventually lol
Ok
